name: aggregate_analysis_results_tool
description: Aggregate results from executed analysis tasks. Combines results from all analysis tasks into a structured summary organized by page. Takes execution results from multiple analyzer tools and creates a cohesive document-level analysis report.

execution_results.description: JSON string containing execution results from all analysis tasks (output from various analyzer tools)

session_id.description: Runtime session ID for organizing output in S3

result.description: Aggregated analysis results organized by page with comprehensive summary
